pageProduct.name: Swisse Ultiboost High Strength Vitamin C 20 Effervescent Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Swisse High Strength Vitamin C Effervescent is a premium quality, great tasting effervescent formula containing vitamin C to support immune function, help reduce the severity and duration of cold symptoms, maintain skin health and provide healthy antioxidant activity.

Swisse High Strength Vitamin C effervescent tablets have been formulated based on scientific evidence to conveniently support your health and wellbeing and are a great tasting alternative for those who have difficulty swallowing large tablets or capsules.

Immune Function

Vitamin C supports a healthy immune system.

Cold Symptoms

Vitamin C helps to reduce the duration and severity of common cold symptoms.

Skin Health

Vitamin C plays an integral role in the formation and structure of collagen and elastin, which are essential for the maintenance of healthy, supple skin.

Size: 20 Tablets

Warnings

Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Adults only. The recommended daily dose of this medicine contains 297mg of sodium.

Ingredients

VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid) 1 g

Directions

One tablet daily, dissolved in water, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25 degrees Celsius in a dry place. Always replace cap. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken.
